results.description: Lewis Grabban takes advantage of a Derby County error to give Nottingham Forest victory over their local rivals.
results.shortTitle: Grabban nets Forest winner against Rams
results.title: Nottingham Forest 1-0 Derby County: Lewis Grabban scores winner for hosts

thumbnail.altText: Nottingham Forest celebrate Lewis Grabban's goal

results.description: Derby's sacking of Richard Keogh and the fallout has been a distraction, boss Phillip Cocu says prior to facing Nottingham Forest.
results.shortTitle: Keogh fallout has affected Derby - Cocu
results.title: Nottingham Forest v Derby County: Cocu admits Keogh controversy affecting Rams

results.description: Wayne Rooney's early involvement at Derby County has given everyone a boost prior to him officially joining up with the squad, says boss Phillip Cocu.
results.shortTitle: Rooney visit a boost for Derby - Cocu
results.title: Wayne Rooney: Phillip Cocu welcomes early visit by Derby County's star signing

results.description: The Professional Footballers' Association says it will "robustly defend" Richard Keogh after his sacking by Derby County.
results.shortTitle: PFA will 'robustly defend' Keogh
results.title: Richard Keogh: The PFA says it will 'robustly defend' the sacked Derby captain

results.description: Richard Keogh's agent says the player's seven years of service to Derby was not properly considered when they sacked him for gross misconduct.
results.shortTitle: 'Keogh deserved to be treated as family'
results.title: Richard Keogh: Agent says Derby should have treated sacked defender 'like family'

thumbnail.altText: Richard Keogh in action for Derby

results.description: Tom Lawrence scores twice as struggling Middlesbrough's winless run is extended to eight games as they lose at Derby County.
results.shortTitle: Lawrence double increases Boro woes
results.title: Derby County 2-0 Middlesbrough: Tom Lawrence double sinks 10-man Boro

results.description: Richard Keogh's role as captain and the added responsibility the position brings was a factor in Derby's decision to sack him.
results.shortTitle: Keogh's captain's role 'influenced sacking'
results.title: Richard Keogh: Sacking by Derby County influenced by responsibility of being captain

thumbnail.altText: Richard Keogh in action for Derby
Richard Keogh in action for Derby
Richard Keogh in action for Derby
Richard Keogh in action for Derby

results.description: Derby County sack captain Richard Keogh for gross misconduct over his involvement in a crash that led to the arrest of two of his team-mates.
results.shortTitle: Derby County sack captain Keogh
results.title: Richard Keogh: Derby County sack captain for 'gross misconduct'

results.description: Hull City secure back-to-back league wins for the first time this season as Jarrod Bowen's second-half double floors Derby.
results.shortTitle: Bowen double helps Tigers sink Derby
results.title: Hull City 2-0 Derby County: Bowen brace earns Tigers win

results.description: Graeme Shinnie's stunning injury-time half-volley earns all three points for Derby County against Wigan Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Shinnie's late Derby winner beats Wigan
results.title: Derby County 1-0 Wigan Athletic: Graeme Shinnie's late winner flattens Latics

thumbnail.altText: Graeme Shinnie's strike was his first for Derby County since his summer move from Aberdeen

results.description: Wayne Rooney has been hailed as a "big plus" during his time at DC United, after the former England captain played his final MLS game.
results.shortTitle: Rooney's MLS career ends with heavy loss
results.title: MLS play-offs: Wayne Rooney a 'big plus' for DC United despite heavy defeat

thumbnail.altText: Wayne Rooney dejected after DC United defeat

results.description: Conor Gallagher's superb long-range strike caps off a complete performance for Charlton Athletic as they thump Derby County.
results.shortTitle: Charlton cruise to victory over Derby
results.title: Charlton Athletic 3-0 Derby County: Gallagher strike seals superb Addicks win

thumbnail.altText: Charlton players celebrate after scoring at The Valley

results.description: Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett were both over the limit when their cars crashed in Derby last month.
results.shortTitle: Drink-drive crash footballers spared jail
results.title: Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett sentenced for drink-driving

results.description: Tom Lawrence scores in his first home match since being charged with drink driving as Derby beat Luton at Pride Park.
results.shortTitle: Lawrence goal seals Rams win over Luton
results.title: Derby County 2-0 Luton Town: Tom Lawrence scores in his first home match since drink driving charge

results.description: Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett are fined six weeks' wages by Derby County after the pair were charged with drink-driving.
results.shortTitle: Lawrence & Bennett fined six weeks' wages
results.title: Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett: Derby pair fined six weeks' wages after drink-driving charge

results.description: Manager Phillip Cocu is not worried about the reception Derby fans at Pride Park may give Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett.
results.shortTitle: Cocu hopes Derby fans back 'whole team'
results.title: Tom Lawrence & Mason Bennett: Phillip Cocu unworried by Derby pair's reception

results.description: Ryan Giggs says selecting Tom Lawrence for Wales' Euro 2020 qualifying double-header was the hardest decision he has had to make as a manager.
results.shortTitle: Lawrence selection call my hardest - Giggs
results.title: Tom Lawrence selection was Ryan Giggs' hardest as Wales boss

results.description: Wales manager Ryan Giggs has picked Tom Lawrence for "football reasons" ahead of the Euro 2020 qualifiers against Slovakia and Croatia.
results.shortTitle: Giggs defends Lawrence Wales selection
results.title: Ryan Giggs: Manager defends Tom Lawrence Wales selection

results.description: Drink-drive accused Tom Lawrence is named in Wales' squad for their Euro 2020 qualifiers against Slovakia and Croatia later this month.
results.shortTitle: Derby's Lawrence named in Wales squad
results.title: Tom Lawrence: Forward named in Wales squad after drink-drive charge

results.description: Boss Phillip Cocu says Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett are aware they are "not off the hook" after returning to the Derby County side at Barnsley.
results.shortTitle: Derby duo 'not off the hook' after return
results.title: Phillip Cocu: Tom Lawrence and Mason Bennett 'not off the hook' after return at Barnsley
